nodes.text: R3-H17 was an R3-series astromech droid bearing festive gold, green and white color plating. The droid had a grasping arm extending from his head, which in one instance held a leafy branch with a red bow tied to it. The astromech was optimized to serve Naboo's Royal Advisory Council.
This holiday-themed droid is a toy that was made available exclusively at Disney Parks in 2017, as announced at Celebration Orlando in April 2017. It holds a branch of mistletoe in its arm.
